title: Confit pork neck with celeriac coleslaw
description: Slow cooking in oil makes the pork meltingly tender. It could be cooked a day in advance and finished off just before serving.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz pork neck, boned and skin removed
400g/14oz waxy potatoes, preferably Charlotte variety, cleaned
salt and freshly ground black pepper.
1 bunch parsley, leaves picked and blanched
1 bunch mint, leaves picked and blanched
1 bunch basil, leaves picked and blanched
1 green pepper, burnt, peeled and deseeded
